body_html: I don't recall any such changes. That last one looks particularly weird, did we eliminate some cond? I remember a change we did not accept about simplifying the scope names for moving averages, but again, we did not accept it (and it would have been too recent to show up here).
body_text:

did we eliminate some cond?

body:
I don't recall any such changes. That last one looks particularly weird,
did we eliminate some cond?

I remember a change we did not accept about simplifying the scope names for
moving averages, but again, we did not accept it (and it would have been
too recent to show up here).
